mapper.select: SELECT P.PRO_IMG, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_PRICE, C.AMOUNT, P.PRO_NUM, C.CART_CODE FROM CART C INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.ID = C.MEM_ID INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRO_NUM = P.PRO_NUM WHERE M.ID = #{memId}

SELECT c.COUPON_CODE, TO_CHAR(NVL(i.COUPON_START_DATE, ''), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as couponStartDate, TO_CHAR(NVL(i.COUPON_END_DATE, '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as couponEndDate, i.DISCOUNT_PRICE, i.COUPON_NAME FROM MEMBER m, MEM_COUPON c, COUPON_INFO i WHERE m.ID = c.MEM_ID AND c.COUPON_CODE = i.COUPON_CODE AND m.ID = #{id} AND ((SYSDATE >= i.COUPON_START_DATE AND SYSDATE <= i.COUPON_END_DATE) OR COUPON_START_DATE IS NULL OR COUPON_END_DATE IS NULL)
